entry.title: Block Size Increase
entry.summary: In an email conversation between Justus Ranvier and Peter Todd, the discussion revolved around the importance of civility and honest intent in forums related to cryptocurrencies. While Peter Todd believes that assuming honesty can be productive until proven otherwise, Justus Ranvier argues that when dealing with someone with proven NSA ties, assuming honest intent should be ignored. However, when it comes to alternative coins and non-Bitcoin-blockchain transactions, assuming anything other than honest intent is not productive in the forum. The email thread ends with Peter Todd's signature.asc attached to the email.
